name: Big Sleep
description:
It's hibernation eve! and you (a hedgehog) have been given the last shift of the year, Finish your work so you can go home and do the big sleep

Recommended Headphones for 3D sound

Thanks for playing! :D

  • All assets are original, freesound.com used for audio samples
  • Game is mouse only, Due to time there are no cues/highlights on interactable objects so try clicking on everything
Made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022) using Unity  Blender  Audacity  Aseprite
